pr_title: Add UDF to map enum value to key

timeline.message: Add UDF to map enum value to key

timeline.bodyText: If you want to further improve the performance, we can make this map lazily instantiated. Add an AtomicBoolean to mark whether the map is instantiated, and create it on first call of getKeyForValue. That way, if the query doesn't need it, you don't need to create this.
timeline.author: rongrong

timeline.message: Add UDF to map enum value to key
Add UDF to map enum value to key

timeline.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText: same problem there – guava isn't a runtime dependency of presto-common
replies.author: daniel-ohayon

timeline.bodyText: Have we considered using a BiMap? e.g. ImmutableBiMap.
timeline.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText: I tried that but that requires adding a maven dependency, and since this code lives in presto-common, that is not desirable
replies.author: daniel-ohayon
